alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Ramsey (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:40AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cavalier and northeastern Ramsey Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 538 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mount Carmel to near Starkweather. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mount Carmel, Maida and Hampden around 545 AM CDT. Langdon and Derrick around 550 AM CDT. Vang around 600 AM CDT. Edmore around 605 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
